text: Tomka railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Tomka village. Its code is TMKA. It has one platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Tomka railway station. ==Major Trains== * Puri - Barbil Express ==See also== * Jajpur district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jajpur district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Tomka railway station
